name: Well, It's Emergency!
description:
A platformer game to put a mystical relic on a demonic tomb to prevent demon uprising.

Hey, don't judge it! It's my first platformer and 3rd complete game!

Also 1st time trying pixel art though!

Character Art was done by Mehedi Hasan, a friend.

Follow Mehedi : https://www.facebook.com/mh.mehedi.143
